AggroGroup.Wiki: Used to group entities together so they become aggressive at the same trigger and sometimes used with aggro boundaries.

GeneratorRegistParam.Wiki: ParamStudio can't deep link because of the way the generatorregistparam files are named to include the map designation at the end.

LocationEventID1.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

LocationEventID2.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

LocationEventID3.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

LocationEventID4.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

LocationEventID5.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

MapObjectBonfireID.Wiki: The ID of the bonfire this entity is linked to. Used with ascetics, effigies, and multi-player.

LocationEventID.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.
An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

AIThinkID.Wiki: The AI for this entity. A boss AI will need to be damaged, changed, or ESD wizardry if you move it elsewhere.

HostileEventID1.Wiki: Flag to be set when the entity becomes hostile towards the player character.

LocationEventID1.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

LocationEventID2.Wiki: An event ID used by ESD or hardcoded logic. Used for location based events, often for an NPC to move from one place to another.

ItemLotID1.Wiki: Typically the itemlot entry that acts as a drop table for this entity.

GraveEventID.Wiki: Flag to be set when the entity is dead and requires a gravestone for the player character to interact with.
